name: sellmyapplication.com
tag_list: mobile-computing, apps, iphone, android, developers, software, business, mobile-apps
overview:
SellMyApplication.com is an online marketplace that connects buyers and sellers of applications and app source code. Buyers and Sellers come to SellMyApplication.com to connect with each other and agree to terms to buy ownership of the application itself and all future royalties that may result. In some cases interested parties may form a partnership to sell and market certain applications in exchange for royalties. It is totally the responsibility of the parties involved to negotiate the terms of the sale and exchange of code or any other part of the business.

There is no application discrimination here and you can buy and sell ownership of any applications for mobile, cloud, or traditional desktop/server applications. This includes iPhone, Android, Blackberry, iPad/iPod, Symbian, Windows Mobile, Palm, Linux, MacOS, and more!

With sellmyapplication.com you can buy a business, a brand, a presence in the multi-billion dollar application industry. The hard part of developing the app is done, simply work with the application seller to have the ownership transferred and then begin your marketing campaign to boost sales! Like website owners who own multiple websites, some application purchasers may seek to build a portfolio and buy multiple applications all of which are generating revenue.

With SellMyApplication.com youâ€™ll be able to reach a highly targeted audience of application developers and entrepreneurs interested in purchasing code to improve existing projects or expand their reach across to new customers.
